# French

## Description
Haha, tu n'y arriveras jamais... this old french men thinks he can troll us. He sends messages and messages again. Show him that you are awesome by breaking the message.

**Link:** https://github.com/SecurityValley/PublicCTFChallenges/tree/master/crypto/french

## Solution

### Encrypted Message
```

```

Since the challenge mentions french we can do a quick search for french ciphers which leads to the `Vigenere Cipher`.

We do not have the key for the cipher but we can brute force this with the use of `https://www.dcode.fr/vigenere-cipher`

### Decrypted Message
```

```

### Retrieving Flag
Reading through the message carefully you find the flag to be `anakinskywalker`

`Flag: SecVal{anakinSkywalker}`
